name: entropyjs
author: Peter Sibirtsev <sibirtsev.peter@gmail.com>
description: EntropyJS Framework designed to avoid editing code when you write and setting up your Express.js application. Most of things you will need to do - is to edit configuration in .json files. No code editing required. Modular structire allows you to organize your modules, such as, blog, forum etc. And organize them, turn them on/off
